text: The 1985 Canadian Professional Championship was a professional non-ranking snooker tournament, which took place in August 1985 in Toronto, Canada. Cliff Thorburn won the title for the second year in a row, and third overall, by beating Bob Chaperon 6–4 in the final. ==Main draw== ==References== Category:1985 in snooker Category:1985 in Canadian sports
title: 1985 Canadian Professional Championship
